item.description:
Please forward this message around to friends and others that should be aware of these issues.

A REMINDER - We have moved away from our longer domain name to the shorter, more streamlined: MV911T.org. be sure to change your bookmarks and mention it to others.

This month in Concord
We will show Richard Gage's Blueprint for Destruction 2008 video this month.

Richard Gage is the founder of Architects and Engineers for 911 Truth, and will be touring through our area soon. We'll announce his appearance dates as soon as we have them.

The website for Architects and Engineers for 911 Truth is: http://ae911truth.org.... There is a huge amount of supporting information on their site. This meetup would be a great one to bring your architect and engineer friends to.

Bring your blank DVDs to the meeting and be sure to get a copy of each video we screen.

We should have time for other short videos as well, so be sure to bring your favorites for us to choose from.



We have screenings every Tuesday somewhere in the Merrimack Valley: 1st Tuesday-Nashua; 2nd Tuesday-Manchester; 3rd Tuesday-Concord; the rest of our schedule is in flux.



Please arrive at 6:30 if you can, in order to help set up the healthy snacks and beverages (that you bring to share with others - a box of tea for Jim's inventory would be appreciated) and enjoy the pre-meeting networking. We'll start a brief business meeting at 7 and then on to the video showing right after that.



Newspaper - For an interesting paper which covers 9/11 Truth issues and other topics of concern, visit the Rock Creek Free Press out of Washington, D.C.



We have set up a "carpooling group" online at eRideShare.com. Ride-sharing arrangements can now be made by clicking on the link above (or this: http://mv911t.eridesh...) to go to the online ridesharing group. Our group nickname is "mv911t" and our password is "truth". You can post if you are driving to one of our events and have extra seats - if you're looking for a ride to an event just logon and post that you're seeking a ride. (Donations to the driver for the ride-sharing are appreciated.)



Bring your friends! - Forward this invitation to everyone!

Write us at MerrimackValley911Truth@gmail.com with suggestions for next month.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be preparing snacks and tea in the kitchenette
item.name: Concord - Monthly video screening
